resources.string: access to passwords for Sample SyncAdapter accounts
Allows applications direct access to the passwords for the Sample SyncAdapter account(s) you have configured.
Allows applications to see the usernames (email addresses) of the Sample SyncAdapter account(s) you have configured.
Touch to sign into your Sample SyncAdapter account.
The username or password isn\'t valid. A Sample SyncAdapter account is required. Please try again.
You entered the wrong password or your account has changed. Please re-enter your password.
Type the password for this account.
Sync Data with your Last.fm user account
Get notifications when new albums are released

Album Tracker is an open source project on Github!
